subject: Hockey, Ice
Halls of Fame
lead_paragraph: Pat Burns, Mike Modano, Rob Blake, Peter Forsberg, Dominik Hasek and the referee Bill McCreary will be inducted into hockey’s hall of fame in Toronto on Monday.
snippet: Pat Burns, Mike Modano, Rob Blake, Peter Forsberg, Dominik Hasek and the referee Bill McCreary will be inducted into hockey’s hall of fame in Toronto on Monday.
